column2: "Ooh, are you here to become a better Gunner? Well, are you?"
"Well that's just wonderful! Let me be the one to file your performance report!"
"So, here's the deal. You're a Gunner, right? I want you to go out and complete this quest with your guns blazing!"
"Of course, it's not my fault if you get killed. Just go for the kill without getting yourself killed. Simply kill, kill, kill and you'll do fine!"
"Okay, okay, okay. I hope you come back a hero instead of in a body bag. I'll be waiting right here, so... GO!"
